content.prompt: The speech could best be used by a historian studying which of the following historical situations related to the First World War?

choices.label: The Senate debate over whether to join the League of Nations
The role of the American Expeditionary Forces in combat alongside the Allies
The changes in traditional ideas about United States noninvolvement in Europe
The strategies pursued by Woodrow Wilson when negotiating the Treaty of Versailles

topic.text: 7.5: World War I - Military and Diplomacy

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain the significance of a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience, including how these might limit the use(s) of a source.
